Package com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core

This package contains the core Magic Lantern runtime engine modules.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IMleActor
    All Magic Lantern Actors should implement this interface.
    IMleCallback
    This interface specifies a generic callback prototype.
    IMleCallbackId
    This interface is used to associate an identifier with a callback implementing the IMleCallback interface.
    IMleGroup
    All Magic Lantern Groups should implement this interface.
    IMleMediaRef
    All Magic Lantern Media References should implement this interface.
    IMleObject
    This interface is used to define functionality that is shared across Magic Lantern Runtime classes.
    IMleProp
    This interface identifies the contract for dealing with Magic Lantern properties in a consistent manner.
    IMleRole
    All Magic Lantern Roles should implement this interface.
    IMleScene
    All Magic Lantern Scenes should implement this interface.
    IMleSet
    All Magic Lantern Sets should implement this interface.
    IMleStage
    All Magic Lantern Stages should implement this interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MleActor
    MleActor is a class that encapsulates a title element that is independent of a specific target platform.
    MleGroup
    Base class for runtime actor groups.
    MleMediaRef
    MleMediaRef is a class that manages references to media assets.
    MleMediaRefConverter
    MleMediaRefConverter is a class that determines a local representation from a media reference, which may be a file, URL, or some other type of identifier.
    MleProp
    This class implements a generic property with an unknown data type (by default).
    MleRole
    MleRole is a class that is used to specify the platform-specific interface of an actor.
    MleScene
    Base class for Magic Lantern Runtime scenes.
    MleSet
    MleSet is a class that encapsulates a actor/role policy for platform-specific behavior.
    MleSize
    This class is used as a container for a managed size element.
    MleStage
    MleStage is a class that manages the rendering for a specific target platform.
    MleTables
    This class is used to define and register the tables generated for a Magic Lantern application.
    MleTables.MleRTActorClassEntry
    This class is a runtime Actor Type Table Entry.
    MleTables.MleRTGroupClassEntry
    This class is a runtime Group Type Table Entry.
    MleTables.MleRTMediaRefEntry
    This class is a runtime Media Reference Table Entry.
    MleTables.MleRTPropertyEntry
    This class is a runtime Actor/Set Property Table Entry.
    MleTables.MleRTRoleClassEntry
    This class is a runtime Role Type Table Entry
    MleTables.MleRTSceneClassEntry
    This class is a runtime Scene Type Table Entry.
    MleTables.MleRTSetClassEntry
    This class is a runtime Set Type Table Entry.
    MleTables.MleRTSetEntry
    This class is a runtime Set Table Entry.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MleRuntimeException
    This class is an Exception used to manage errors that occur while executing a Magic Lantern application.

Package com.wizzer.mle.runtime.core Description

This package contains the core Magic Lantern runtime engine modules.

The package provides interfaces and base classes for the core Magic Lantern objects: the Actor, Role, Media Reference, Set and Stage. It also contains the registry of title components.
